Package com.varukha.webproject.model.service.impl

Class InvoiceServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.varukha.webproject.model.service.impl.InvoiceServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
InvoiceService
public class InvoiceServiceImpl extends Object implements InvoiceService
Class InvoiceServiceImpl implements methods for interacting between View layer and the MySQL Data Access layer
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dmytro Varukha

    • addInvoice

      public boolean addInvoice(Map<String,String> invoiceData) throws ServiceException, IncorrectInputException
      Method addInvoice is an intermediate service method for communication between the user view layer and the database and used to set necessary data in order to add new invoice to database.
      Specified by:
      addInvoice in interface InvoiceService
      Parameters:
      invoiceData - contain a set of data from user request that will be process in data access layer.
      Returns:
      boolean result of operation. Return true if new invoice data was set successfully and false if not.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - is wrapper for DAOException that throws exception during the runtime because of data validation fail or others mistakes.
      IncorrectInputException
